package.name: a_multirob
package.description: This package contains the necessary launchfiles to launch a simulatin with two modified versions of the Turtlebot robot (with a UST-10 LIDAR and an Orbbec Astra RGB-D camera and a green plate on their back. All this in an empty world. It also contains a perception node, which will use the camera of one of the robots to publish some information useful to follow the other one using basic computer vision.
package.author: Jose Miguel Torres Camara
